home.title: Meena & Arun
home.subtitle: are getting married!
home.description: Good morning babe! I love you and you are an amazing person!
home.missthis: YOU WON'T WANT TO MISS THIS!

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.subtitle: Please respond by July 1st, 2025
rsvp.cardTitle: We Hope You Can Join Us!
rsvp.cardDescription: Please fill out the form below to let us know if you'll be attending our special day.
rsvp.dietaryPlaceholder: Please let us know about any dietary restrictions or food allergies...
rsvp.songPlaceholder: Any song you'd like to hear at the reception?
rsvp.accommodations: I need information about local accommodations
rsvp.messagePlaceholder: Share your well wishes or any special message...
rsvp.thankYouMessage: Your RSVP has been received. We can't wait to celebrate with you!

details.title: Event Details
details.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our special day
details.venueDescription: Our wedding ceremony will be held over two joyous days at our ancestral home, surrounded by timeless architecture and cherished family traditions. From heartfelt rituals to lively celebrations, we can’t wait to share this meaningful experience with you. For more events, please view the schedule below.
details.dressCodeDescription: Come dressed in your favorite traditional attire—bright colors, rich fabrics, and personal flair are all welcome! There’s no strict dress code, so feel free to express yourself through your look.
details.parkingDescription: We can help to book cars from your accomodation to the wedding venue.
details.accommodationsDescription: There are many great options in the vicinity. Please contact us for further information.
details.dinnerDescription: All three meals are provided for each day of the wedding! This will definitely be a highlight!
details.photographyDescription: We'll have a professional photographer, but feel free to take photos! Please share them with {hashtag yet to be decided}.
details.questionsDescription: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly.
